lunch_1.title: Grilled Chicken
lunch_1.description: Tender grilled chicken breast served on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, tossed with classic Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, and homemade croutons.

lunch_2.title: Margherita Pizza
lunch_2.description: A traditional Italian favorite featuring a thin crust topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, mozzarella cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil.

lunch_3.title: Vegetarian Quinoa Bowl
lunch_3.description: Nutritious quinoa mixed with roasted seasonal vegetables, chickpeas, avocado slices, and a zesty lemon tahini dressing.

lunch_4.title: Classic Club Sandwich
lunch_4.description: Triple-decker sandwich with layers of roasted turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on toasted whole wheat bread. Served with a side of fries.

lunch_5.title: Shrimp Tacos
lunch_5.description: Three soft corn tortillas filled with grilled shrimp, shredded cabbage, pico de gallo, avocado slices, and a tangy chipotle aioli. served with a side of rice and beans.

breakfast_1.title: Avocado Toast
breakfast_1.description: Sliced avocado on toasted multigrain bread, topped with cherry tomatoes, feta cheese crumbles, and a sprinkle of everything bagel seasoning.

breakfast_2.title: Classic Eggs Benedict
breakfast_2.description: Two poached eggs served on toasted English muffins with Canadian bacon, hollandaise sauce, and a side of breakfast potatoes.

breakfast_3.title: Blueberry Pancakes
breakfast_3.description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes filled with plump blueberries and served with maple syrup and whipped butter.

breakfast_4.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
breakfast_4.description: Creamy Greek yogurt layered with fresh berries, granola, and a drizzle of honey.

breakfast_5.title: Breakfast Burrito
breakfast_5.description: A flour tortilla stuffed with scrambled eggs, diced ham, peppers, onions, cheddar cheese, and salsa. Served with a side of sour cream and salsa.

dinner_1.title: Grilled Salmon with Sauce
dinner_1.description: Tender grilled salmon fillet topped with a tangy lemon-dill sauce, served with roasted vegetables and garlic mashed potatoes.

dinner_2.title: Mushroom Risotto
dinner_2.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with assorted mushrooms, shallots, garlic, white wine, and Parmesan cheese, finished with a drizzle of truffle oil.

dinner_3.title: Steak Frites
dinner_3.description: Grilled sirloin steak cooked to your liking, served with crispy seasoned fries and a side of garlic aioli for dipping.

dinner_4.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
dinner_4.description: Fresh mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy ginger sauce, served over steamed jasmine rice.

dinner_5.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
dinner_5.description: Grilled chicken breast served over fettuccine pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce with Parmesan cheese and garlic bread on the side.

snacks_1.title: Caprese Skewers
snacks_1.description: Fresh mozzarella balls, cherry tomatoes, and basil leaves skewered together and drizzled with balsamic glaze.

snacks_2.title: Hummus and Veggie Platter
snacks_2.description: Creamy hummus served with a variety of fresh vegetables such as carrots, cucumbers, bell peppers, and cherry tomatoes, accompanied by pita bread.

snacks_3.title: Stuffed Jalapeños
snacks_3.description: alapeño peppers stuffed with cream cheese and wrapped in crispy bacon, served with a side of ranch dipping sauce.

snacks_4.title: Loaded Nachos
snacks_4.description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheddar cheese, black beans, diced tomatoes, jalapeños, sour cream, and guacamole.

snacks_5.title: Fruit and Cheese Plate
snacks_5.description: A selection of seasonal fruits, such as grapes, strawberries, and melon, paired with assorted cheeses and crackers.

coffee_1.title: Espresso
coffee_1.description: A single shot of intense, rich espresso made from freshly ground beans, perfect for a quick caffeine boost

coffee_2.title: Cappuccino
coffee_2.description: A classic Italian coffee made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk, topped with a sprinkle of cocoa powder.

coffee_3.title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
coffee_3.description: A refreshing blend of espresso, milk, and caramel syrup poured over ice, finished with a drizzle of caramel sauce.

coffee_4.title: Mocha Latte
coffee_4.description: A smooth and indulgent combination of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream.

coffee_5.title: Cold Brew
coffee_5.description: Smooth and bold, our cold brew coffee is steeped for hours to achieve a rich flavor with a subtle sweetness, served over ice.
